ygData.msgSnippet: Ice:: She smiled at him. She could tell he wasn t in a good mood. But she couldn t help but chuckle alittle. You need to wake up on the right side of the CR

Ice::

She smiled at him. She could tell he wasn't in a good mood. But she 
couldn't help but chuckle alittle. "You need to wake up on the right 
side of the CR tank a little more often." She walked out of the lab 
and went wandering around the ship. She transformed into her knew bot 
mode and went looking for Lunarpine. She sensed his thoughts and went 
through the ship looking for him. She found him and FoxFingers 
together. She smiled,"Hello all. I finally got things worked out." 
She picked up FoxFingers with her Telekenesis and floated him over to 
her. She smiled and shook his hand. "Hello there. I'm Ice. Pleased to 
meet you." She set him down and looked over at Lunarpine. "How are 
you feeling. I wanted to thank you for saving my life, again." she 
smiled and chuckled slightly. "You know, you have this habit of 
saving my hide. I hope that oneday, I can return the favor." She 
projected this thought into his head,"My love." so FoxFingers 
couldn't hear it.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis awoke in a start."Ice, please don't do that to me while I'm
> sleeping." He lay back again but couldn't fall back to 
sleep. "Alright you
> win, I'm on my way." His chamber opened up and he stepped out. He 
wasn't
> fully functional yet. he was beginning to wonder if giving her this 
body was
> a mistake. She was the bear but it was him that was fealing grumpy 
at the
> moment. He stepped to the replicator and created a reboost compound 
(Roboyic
> coffee) he sucked it down and proceeded to the lab. He stepped in 
and saw
> the mess that the drones had created. "Should I even bother to ask 
what went
> on in here?" He saw the two drones on the floor. "Never mind, I 
don't want
> to know." He proceeded to the computer to see what the scans for 
the night
> had read. "It seems you had a strong ECG reading for the night." 
Again the
> old science bot checked the mess in the room. "Which would explain 
this
> mess." He checked all the readings multiple times to be sure of the 
results.
> "It seems the virus is out of your system, you're free to go outside
> whenever you like. "Preferably ASAP." his thoughts weren't easy to 
hide as
> he started programming the other drones to clean up the mess.
> 
> After his job was complete he decided that since he was already 
awake he'd
> check the DNA that foxfingers hsd brought back. he had a grizzly 
bear, a
> wolf, and an extremely powerful raptor. those deffinitely had
> possabilities.The Dragon cells were an odd addition and (Whatever 
Tavatron
> turned into) could be set aside for now. He decided to start with 
the
> raptor. he programmed another protoform and began the procedure. He 
tried to
> deprogram the parts of the DNA that were Transmetal2 technology. As 
an
> experiment he injected the virus once again. If Primes prophecy was 
to
> become a reality he'd need to make creatures to fit the 
description. "All
> would become one" and Translife and organics would join.
